creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: woven brocade-like design with white borders and twisted white fringe on short sides; overall flower and vine design in pink and blue on white; pink tassel made of two cord loops at one corner
dimension: 49 1/16 x 29 in. (124.62 x 73.66 cm) (without fringe or tassels)
title: Waist wrap (shemle)
